channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Armed police at Reading college after boy injured in assault
item.description: Thames Valley police urge public to avoid Kings Road area as ‘search activity is ongoing’ Armed police officers are at a college in Reading after a bo...

item.title: Lammy says he was not ‘equipped with the details’ when facing questions on mistaken prisoner release at PMQs – UK politics live
item.description: Deputy PM accused of being ‘dishonest’ and his performance at PMQs ‘a disgrace’ by Tory MPs David Lammy , the deputy PM and justice secretary, has wel...

item.title: German police detain man suspected of painting swastikas on cars and walls with his own blood – Europe live
item.description: Swastikas are banned in Germany under laws banning the public display of Nazi symbols EU’s digital spokesperson Thomas Regnier said the European Commi...

item.title: Nancy Pelosi, former House speaker, says she will not seek re-election to Congress – US politics live
item.description: Pelosi, who represents San Francisco, announces she will stand down in 2027 Nancy Pelosi, a force on Capitol Hill for decades, to retire from Congress...

item.title: King Charles officially strips Andrew of HRH style and prince title
item.description: Mountbatten Windsor is no longer entitled to use the terms and has been erased from roll of peerage King Charles has officially stripped the former Du...

item.title: Typhoon Kalmaegi hits Vietnam after killing at least 114 in Philippines
item.description: More than 260,000 soldiers are on standby for rescue efforts as winds of up to 92mph (149km/h) hit Vietnam.

item.title: Wolves set to make approach for Boro boss Edwards
item.description: Wolves are set to make an approach to Championship side Middlesbrough over appointing Rob Edwards as their head coach.

item.title: King officially strips Andrew of prince title
item.description: The action was previously announced, and the official record now shows it has taken place.

item.title: Bank says inflation has 'peaked' as it holds interest rates
item.description: Rates are left unchanged after a tight vote ahead of the Budget later this month.

item.title: Record referrals to Prevent anti-terror programme
item.description: The number of referrals to the scheme increased 27% in the year to March 2025, according to new data.
